questions.instructions: Underline the correct word or phrase.

qa_pairs.item: ¹Why are / do you running so fast? We have plenty of time.
²Does / Is your brother working at the new restaurant downtown?
³He doesn't / isn't using his computer right now; he's on the phone.
⁴She doesn't / isn't watching the movie; she's sleeping on the sofa.
⁵Do / Are they generally need to make a reservation at that café?
⁶What is / does he doing over there by the window?

questions.instructions: Underline the correct word or phrase.

qa_pairs.item: ¹I 'm not / don't going to the party tonight because I feel tired.
²What kind of music are / do you usually listen to?
³They aren't / don't making so much noise; the baby is awake now.
⁴He doesn't / isn't like romantic movies at all.
⁵Are / Do you have any pets at home?
⁶What are / do the children studying in school this semester?
